input_text:
Job Title: Hairstylist/Licensed Cosmetologist

Location: Washington, DC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
SIGNING BONUS - $500About Thrive Hair BarThrive Hair Bar DC is a premier, luxury natural hair salon proudly located in one of Washington, DC’s most vibrant and historic neighborhoods, H Street NE. We specialize in natural hair styling services, including twists, locs, braids, and blowouts, tailored to enhance and celebrate the beauty of kinky, coily, and curly hair. In addition to our expert styling, we offer personalized consultations and a curated selection of retail products to empower our clients to embrace and care for their unique hair journey. Committed to fostering a sense of community and empowerment, we also host local events that celebrate diversity and promote the normalization of natural hair in every facet of life, from professional to personal to luxurious. At Thrive Hair Bar, we believe in the transformative power of embracing one’s natural beauty, and we are dedicated to helping our clients feel confident, empowered and utterly fabulous in their natural glory.About Thrive Hair Bar StylistsAs a Natural Hair Stylist at Thrive Hair Bar, your role encompasses a multifaceted approach to delivering exceptional service and fostering a welcoming environment for our clientele., Your artistry in natural hair styling such as blowouts, twists, locs, and braids will shine as we foster a place for you to grow not just as a stylist but also as a hair care expert. You will provide personalized consultations tailored to each clients’ unique needs and desires. Beyond styling and consulting, maintaining cleanliness throughout the salon is paramount. Upholding our standards of service includes ensuring that all products, tools, equipment, and workstations are meticulously sanitized, disinfected, and carefully maintained. Join us in our mission to normalize kinky, coily, and curly hair in all settings, while providing top-notch service in a clean, inviting, luxurious salon designed for all hair types to thrive.RequirementsYou must be a licensed cosmetologist or licensed natural hair stylist/braider in DC.You must commit to four, 8 hour training sessions over two weeksPay & Benefits$500 Signing Bonus!Service commission + retail commission + tipsComplimentary training is provided for all team membersJob Types: Full-time, Part-time
Pay: $40,000.00 - $70,000.00 per year
Expected hours: No less than 8 per week

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Hairstylist/Licensed Cosmetologist
output_json.summary: Luxury natural hair salon in Washington, DC specializing in styling services for kinky, coily, and curly hair.
job_responsibilities: Ensuring all products, tools, equipment, and workstations are meticulously sanitized
Offering a clean, inviting, luxurious salon experience
output_json.company_information: Thrive Hair Bar DC is a premier, luxury natural hair salon located in Washington, DC. Specializes in natural hair styling services and offers personalized consultations and retail products.
